roleset.name: spread out into branches, extend into subdivisions

role.descr: agent, entity making something be grow, spread
EXT or TMP, by how much or until when

example.name: Science
example.text: ...an increasing diversity of broken symmetries in the universe creates the diversity of structures and processes that can constitute and identify ramified and ramifying sources of energy...

example.name: More understandable, passive
example.text: The problem merely ramified after the unsuccessful meeting.

roleset.note: RAMIFY-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from ramify.01-v)

roleset.name: effect

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: The price hike of petroleum has its ramifications on market goods, commodities of daily use, and others as well.
example.arg: on market goods, commodities of daily use, and others as well.

example.name: arg0
example.text: Plus , one must consider the potential ramifications of thermonuclear weapons falling into the hands of a regime run by the clergy ; a clergy that has repeatedly laid claims to the island nation of Bahrain , supports Nasrallah 's thuggish militia in Lebanon , makes continual references to the apocolypse and the return of the ' twelfth imam ' , and so on .
example.arg: of thermonuclear weapons falling into the hands of a regime run by the clergy ; a clergy that has repeatedly laid claims to the island nation of Bahrain , supports Nasrallah 's thuggish militia in Lebanon , makes continual references to the apocolypse and the return of the ' twelfth imam ' , and so on

roleset.note: RAMIFICATION-N NOTES: Added by julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to (from ramification.01-n)
